items.content_html: Repository Name: CheapCloud Description: CheapCloud is a lightweight Node.js server application for storing and managing files in a cost-effective manner. This application utilizes Express.js for handling HTTP requests and Multer for file uploads. It allows users to upload, retrieve, and delete files through a simple RESTful API.
items.title: RobKhach/CheapCloud_FirstTask:  Repository Name: CheapCloud  Description: CheapCloud is a lightweight Node.js server application for storing and managing files in a cost-effective manner. This application utilizes Express.js for handling HTTP requests and Multer for file uploads. It allows users to upload, retrieve, and delete files through a simple RESTful API.

items.content_html: 🏠 A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your CloudFree "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central as a pure virtual appliance (under Proxmox VE, Home Assistant, Docker/OCI, LXC, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on your own device (e.g. RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, intelNUC, etc.)
